title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Traveling Trunks
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Traveling Trunks                Traveling Trunks         Major General Lew Wallace   Unable to bring your class to the battlefield? Bring the battlefield to your class!  An educational electronic traveling trunk is available free of charge. It is designed to engage eighth-grade students in an in-depth historical investigation of the impact of the Battle of Monocacy.  Students use primary and secondary sources to explore and discuss the significant of the Battle of Monocacy from the following points of view.  Historian Geographer Politician Economist  Military Civilian  Call 301-662-3515 to learn how to access the trunk.
